person.persName: Thomas B. Wadlington (Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of William Wadlington. Father of William J. Wadlington. Married to Mary A. J. Cartwright Wadlington in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on December 21, 1850. Father of Thomas Wadlington, Mary Wadlington, and Ann Wadlington. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer and convict in Caldwell County in 1860. Household owned seven enslaved persons (including John and Jourdan) in Caldwell County in 1860. Convicted of the murder of Milton A. Cartwright in November 1860. Prisoner in the Kentucky State Penitentiary from March 21, 1861, to his death on March 21, 1863.
